description: This is an evidence of property insurance document that provides details about the insurance policy, coverage, and additional insured information.

coverageperilsforms.instruction: The types of coverage, perils, and policy forms included

amount_of_insurance.instruction: The amount of insurance coverage for each type of coverage

deductible.instruction: The deductible amount for each type of coverage

loan_number.instruction: The loan number associated with the mortgagee

payment_remittance.instruction: The address to send premium payments

payment_method.instruction: The method of payment for the premium

full_term_premium.instruction: The total premium amount for the full policy term

amount_paid.instruction: The amount of premium that has been paid

payment_due_date.instruction: The date the premium payment is due

policy_updates.instruction: Contact information for making policy updates

billing_&_payment.instruction: Contact information for billing and payment inquiries

invoice_&_coverage.instruction: Contact information for invoice and coverage inquiries

customer_portal.instruction: URL for the customer portal to access account information

effective_date.instruction: The date the insurance policy becomes effective

expiration_date.instruction: The date the insurance policy expires

policy_number.instruction: The unique identifier for the insurance policy

insured_name.instruction: The name of the insured person or entity

insured_address.instruction: The address of the insured person or entity

additional_insured.instruction: The name of any additional insured parties

property_location.instruction: The address of the insured property

remarks.instruction: Any additional remarks or notes about the policy

premium_amount.instruction: The total premium amount for the policy

authorized_representative.instruction: The name of the authorized representative
